survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, accessibility, and satisfaction with on-site childcare facilities provided by the company.

questions.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facilities provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: If 'No' is selected, skip to Q5.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question for clarity. Ensure this is the first question to route respondents appropriately.

script.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facilities provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: If 'No' is selected, skip to Q5.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and safety of the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and safety of the on-site childcare facilities?
script.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the qualifications and friendliness of the childcare staff?
questions.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is clear and straightforward.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the qualifications and friendliness of the childcare staff?
script.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?
script.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facilities, what are the primary reasons? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Hours of operation do not meet my needs
questions.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'No' or 'N/A'.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify barriers. Include an 'Other' option for additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facilities, what are the primary reasons? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Hours of operation do not meet my needs
script.routing_logic: Display only if Q1 answer is 'No' or 'N/A'.
